name: GHA Skip CI on Label
description: Skip CI jobs when PR has 'skip-ci' label.

files.template:
name: Skip CI

on: [pull_request]

jobs:
  decide:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    outputs:
      skip: ${{ steps.check.outputs.skip }}
    steps:
      - id: check
        run: |
          echo "skip=false" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
          if [[ "${{ toJson(github.event.pull_request.labels.*.name) }}" == *"skip-ci"* ]]; then echo "skip=true" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT; fi
  build:
    needs: decide
    if: needs.decide.outputs.skip != 'true'
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - run: echo 'Running CI'
